ke2lT16m4QDL8JVJomFGA.title: A bit more closer to the china border
ke2lT16m4QDL8JVJomFGA.description: Normally ITBP guys don't allow anyone to go beyond the checkpost except if you're a localite.

PIMGYHtCDNdRDPwDSU2bx.title: Black & White
PIMGYHtCDNdRDPwDSU2bx.description: ... and tiny shades of some other colors

hh4-eyYnCGGmW2Wo-9Uj8.title: Snow covered canopies
hh4-eyYnCGGmW2Wo-9Uj8.description: This view can only be seen just after a snowfall because they are the first to melt when sun comes up.

dAB0ulQcAONaWjRHx-QEM.title: Snow snow everywhere
dAB0ulQcAONaWjRHx-QEM.description: How can one not fall in love with such a place ?

6aKmEaTzHWvnHP2yJA_FT.title: Same mountain, different colors
6aKmEaTzHWvnHP2yJA_FT.description: Seperated by a gap of around 6 hours

aDWEzNJPzNlZOOYRw4pie.title: The last light
aDWEzNJPzNlZOOYRw4pie.description: Gotta admit, looked way better in real.

agdD4MI8ZMGNJc7NC0Ei3.title: Nighty night
agdD4MI8ZMGNJc7NC0Ei3.description: Mhara Chitkul Switzerland se kam h ke

3IfQJHlFXg8tdRrVW0M0u.title: Little moments of pure joy
3IfQJHlFXg8tdRrVW0M0u.description: Curious grandpa experiences live drone footage for the first time.

H0vRL7w1C0EsZDkRd67xK.title: Snow capped mountains and blue sky
H0vRL7w1C0EsZDkRd67xK.description: Btw there's China border behind those mountains

HxBeTeUUNV24ZQe7Wr86u.title: Tiranga point
HxBeTeUUNV24ZQe7Wr86u.description: Around an hour of easy hike from the Chitkul fort.

7rPUT4aY6VKYUE_C23xHN.title: Food storage for cows
7rPUT4aY6VKYUE_C23xHN.description: This place gets covered in around 6 feet of snow during the winters, hence the need of storing fodder for the cattle.

zU9UtwwXFxqLy06Aim1xn.title: Not a drone shot
zU9UtwwXFxqLy06Aim1xn.description: This is one of the mountain's top. Reached there after a moderate hike of around 3 hours. Gotta say, it looked way better in real.

QSx-t-S9qkAWcA3-to20A.title: Strolling
QSx-t-S9qkAWcA3-to20A.description: One benefit of going to places during off-season is that there's no one else in the sight. Just you, the nature and the peace.

PPzIqwnpQKJyhMKyGinmA.title: Chitkul Bridge
PPzIqwnpQKJyhMKyGinmA.description: To the other side of the Baspa river, in the wilderness.

3GQatnsRuJynel6i5OWeJ.title: Govt School
3GQatnsRuJynel6i5OWeJ.description: Gotta admit, if I had to go to a school like this while growing up, I would've topped every class. LoL.

Q3XJatNMENt6Zy4yDN_ZR.title: This is a sunrise
Q3XJatNMENt6Zy4yDN_ZR.description: When you wake up early morning around 5:30AM and you get to see the crescent moon during the sunrise.

aGNs_XxWTkEOKsVs7LqLW.title: Kalpa and its apple orchards
aGNs_XxWTkEOKsVs7LqLW.description: More than 50% of the trees that you see in this photos are of apple

aaTjjv_jaoFv6G3o8BZzI.title: kinnaur Kailash
aaTjjv_jaoFv6G3o8BZzI.description: The shining white stone you see in this is the shivling. As viewed from Kalpa, it changes colors multiple times during the day because of the sunlight's angle.

Ehq7yZxy8rq_U_glktaG-.title: Chaka Peak
Ehq7yZxy8rq_U_glktaG-.description: Funny story, I asked a villager about this trek. He mentioned that it's about 4-5Kms. Without further researching I said to myself that if I leave at around 10AM then I should be back by lunch. I took a water bottle with me and left. Within the first 30 minutes I realized I made a huge mistake. I underestimated the trek. It was a pretty steep climb under full sunlight. Till the top I got completely tired and dehydrated.I came back to my room at around 7PM in the night.

K41-3c_NxQwQJeeMXbnBK.title: The deadly mountains of Kinnaur
K41-3c_NxQwQJeeMXbnBK.description: Of all the places I've been to, these are the scary mountains. Completely vertical and there's stones falling from the top all year round.

CHTo_vFKxU5oASkRofQNX.title: And then there's this good boy

EPwPou2BC08NkzGj6BvYE.title: U19 sports meet
EPwPou2BC08NkzGj6BvYE.description: On day 1, when I reached Kalpa, I didn't know what to do. I started walking randomly in some direction and ended up reaching here.

gbOQnqAtzcjCXjxYNcReo.title: Fancy some tea, eh ?
gbOQnqAtzcjCXjxYNcReo.description: Cold winter, wooden furnace and tea.

JkFhRbE7Z565p01_zoijJ.title: I may or may not be drunk in these

j7Xq7zKAcgQ7dM9ZjB-Dq.title: Monsoons are the worst time to visit Goa
j7Xq7zKAcgQ7dM9ZjB-Dq.description: But as they say, when life gives you rains, make rainonade or something üòÖ

a--4n9AfkRpCNJw99q-D_.title: Stick
a--4n9AfkRpCNJw99q-D_.description: So who got the stick in the end ? Well some mysteries remain mystery till the end.

4id9VIV9xuXADqdyMTlMJ.title: Tea
4id9VIV9xuXADqdyMTlMJ.description: With the tea gardens in the backdrop

I2TlRKPyXTIKSh5ykM_nO.title: Beach
I2TlRKPyXTIKSh5ykM_nO.description: 24 hours of rain, no sunrise or sunset but still okay because the beach was just 20 steps away

N02uLvUaVHeNa19ZhwN8D.title: V for Varkala
N02uLvUaVHeNa19ZhwN8D.description: One of a kind experience. Rooftop cafes on a hill, overlooking the sea with the sunset right in front.

wI9ascqaqrHYHMOb9akzM.title: Paragliding
wI9ascqaqrHYHMOb9akzM.description: Not gonna lie, I was a bit scared in the first half

jJpqpipdsOszU-uL7uR7R.title: Yup, that's me
jJpqpipdsOszU-uL7uR7R.description: There's this thing about adventure, you're scared in the beginning but once you take that first step, you end up loving it.

0a21606xlLXUtkTW7GFvR.title: Nyingma Monastery
0a21606xlLXUtkTW7GFvR.description: With paragliders in the sky flying above it

oVPjIGGi9Rm605VzazPpw.title: Kheerganga
oVPjIGGi9Rm605VzazPpw.description: A trek of around 14Kms near Tosh

_CNu0JKDFhcxLHL7r0Dyh.title: Early sunrise
_CNu0JKDFhcxLHL7r0Dyh.description: When the first rays hit the snow.

Jye3O1KLP5I133BKLyZUQ.title: River stream
Jye3O1KLP5I133BKLyZUQ.description: ...alongside snow covered mountains, what else one needs ?

EnDDWEHUYrGFoG9RcWWlA.title: Israeli Cafe
EnDDWEHUYrGFoG9RcWWlA.description: This was the first time I experience such kind of cafe. Small tables, seating arrangements on the ground and a tent made out of thick cloth. Amazing vibe, awesome ambience.
